alfredsnippet.snippet:
"Scientists can answer questions that they pose for themselves, and spend most of their time doing so, and encourage their 'stooges' to ask these questions; but they cannot well answer questions that are asked by others, true others, who come out of a different mentality and have different purposes in mind."

- Alfred de Grazia
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - The Questions Scientists Can Answer
